website_summaries.verdict: Its sturdy strap system doesn’t get in the way when clambering around rooftops, though it may be too large for smaller-framed people.
pros: Lightweight but strong strap system that does not tangle
Fits average-sized users very well and straps adjust quickly
Attaches easily and securely to safety rope
cons: Newer users may be frustrated by lack of instructions on how to wear this harness
Smaller-framed users may find it too large to adjust comfortably

website_summaries.verdict: Designed for fall protection, workers can use this fairly priced device for extra security. Close attention must be paid to all adjustment points for maximum benefit.
pros: Includes two side rings and dorsal ring
cons: To achieve the most secure fit, close attention must be paid to all connection points, and re-tightening may be necessary

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: My husband wore this while roofing the peak of our house. It worked perfectly. He was very secure even while tied off working down near the eaves. I about had a heart attack watching him, but could see clearly that the harness and tie off was holding him securely. He said it fit well with no bunching. Didnt seem to get in his way at all from what I could tell. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Short time use only
customer_reviews.text: Adequate for short time wearing, but the thigh straps loosened & caused uncomfortable sliding & movement after a couple of hours. Returned this one for one with tongue buckle leg straps -similar to how a belt fastens. Ten dollar price difference for a huge improvement in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Diane g.

customer_reviews.title: Quality rig
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'6" 270# & this fits great. There's a bit of room to adjust larger, & a lot of room to adjust smaller. Seems just as sturdy as the much higher-priced versions I've used at work before.
customer_reviews.author: 53K5HUN-8

customer_reviews.title: good quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm a DIYer who wanted something that I can be sure will save me from my clumsy self while up on the roof. This harness does the trick. It fits my 6'4" 220lb frame well with plenty of room to spare. It seems well-made. I like that there are stretch indicators along the seams so you can tell when the harness has become stretched beyond its safe use--an important feature.
customer_reviews.author: JRCash

customer_reviews.title: Awesome heavy duty product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This harness seems very well made and is heavy duty for the price. I was expecting some lighter weight straps and rings for the cost, but it was heavier materials than I expected, which is a good thing. I used in for two story chimney work and it was perfect. It adjusted well to my body, and I'm not a big guy, but plenty of room in the straps for many sizes. This is well worth the cost for being 35 feet up on a roof and having that safety backup.
customer_reviews.author: B. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my purpose. Not the most comfortable and easiest to put on but you get what you pay for. and for the price I dont think you could beat this.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great price for safety
customer_reviews.text: Great price for safety, worked great, used it a bunch. For the price you can not beat it. I did have to retighten it every once in a while. But no big deal for a occasional handyman.
customer_reviews.author: Sean91

customer_reviews.title: Leg straps worthless
customer_reviews.text: The leg straps are absolutely horrible and do not stay adjusted to fit constantly have to pull straps tight and slide up the rubber stopper which is absolutely useless. As for safety totally has me concerned I may slip out. I work out of a 90 foot bucket truck almost daily, this is not my go to harness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for roofing
customer_reviews.text: Good basic safety vest when I was roofing with my sons. Bought three of them for the roof job and anchored them on the ridge of the roof with a cleat and got some 1/2 braided line to secure. They adjust for medium sized people, however tight for someone over 230 lbs. Good safety clip on the back and two on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: name

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We were going to be doing a roof and bought this item and it was fantastic. However I came to my senses and hired a roofer and returned this item. It was a great buy, well made, and if I was going to do my roof I’d recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work as intended. It will not keep someone safe! The buckles loosen themselves easily, and I had to constantly adjust them to keep the harness snug. I returned it, would never buy again!
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: works for the casual
customer_reviews.text: The straps wiggle loose over time, so I had to tighten them frequently while using it, but it works well for safety, and seems well built. It is nice to have the peace of mind while climbing, but I reckon it will hurt quite a bit if I ever need it to catch me.
customer_reviews.author: Kamden

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can change the sizes to fit a small frame or large frame person. We had purchased a safety harness before that was adjustable too but was fairly limited. This one is far more adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Ojeda

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my job. I like that I can now feel safe while I am dangling from the top of the building. Would not be good though for a tall person.
customer_reviews.author: Julie D.

customer_reviews.title: Loosens up quickly
customer_reviews.text: The straps loosens fairly quickly so I have to constantly adjust them. Other than that the harness fits well and isn’t binding
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what is pictured. Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what my husband needed for work. It arrived quickly, and he will now be safe while working. Which makes for a happy wife.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Royals Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust comfortable to wear over long periods of time
customer_reviews.author: Richard Emord

customer_reviews.title: No way!
customer_reviews.text: My fault for buying a cheap harness. I had a job hanging off a building and would not dare use it. Need it if you’re on a lift and it’s mandatory, maybe. Use this where you might fall and have to rely on this harness to hold you? Nope. Your life or another $50.00 for a better one?
customer_reviews.author: E.J. Zayas

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to move around with, I have ordered at least 8 from this company and they have all been same equally good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Xaviebug

customer_reviews.title: Great value !
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for me to work on a steep roof. Hurricane Florence tore up our roof, and I was able to use this to rework my roof. I felt totally secure in the harness and it worked great .
customer_reviews.author: david peed

customer_reviews.title: Dendable, bought two
customer_reviews.text: These Safety harnesses are ideal for roofs with sharp pitch. Harness is heavy duty, and easy to maneuver on a roof.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Great Safety gear
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal, comes buckled together and easy to adjust for size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: safe to clean roof
customer_reviews.text: I bought to assist in cleaning the roof and gutters. Harness adjust easily and with a OSHA lifeline it was safe and easy
customer_reviews.author: Greg Mierz

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Harness fits well easy to put on like the two d rings on each side
customer_reviews.author: William McNeill

customer_reviews.title: Safety Harness
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the ease to put this harness on. Feel very secure.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shelley

customer_reviews.title: HARNESS DURABLE & STRONG
customer_reviews.text: I'D SEARCHED VARIOUS STORES LOOKING FORA SAFETY HARNES TO CLIMB TREES,TILL I SAW,ON YOUR APP...IT IS FANTASTIC MORE THAN I EXPECTED WITH ADDIONAL ADD ONS LOVE AND MANY THANKS
customer_reviews.author: CARLOS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This one works better for taller people or ones with a longer torso.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Safe and working well
customer_reviews.text: Our staff uses it protect themselves when working. It is safe and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Great for safety and for fun.
customer_reviews.text: Thos thing is super heavy duty and great quality. I'm using it for ziplines in my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good safety outfit
customer_reviews.text: Confusing as heck to set up but once you do get it right, can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Pair A Normal

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay tight !
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special about it, seems like required quality, with the exception that it keeps loosening. There must be a better way to keep it tight. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Owyhee Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with my purchase, not a bad buy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really do feel safer on the roof tied in with this
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment
customer_reviews.text: I use this for moving man lifts and equipment. Love the harness
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Harness
customer_reviews.text: Very nice harness. Easy to adjust & buckles are easy to use & very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Very secure feeling
customer_reviews.text: It fit right and it made me feel very comfortable and secure
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cas

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be redesigned
customer_reviews.text: Straps slide around too much. Buy a different one if you can
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for your safety
customer_reviews.text: Don't like the crotch fit, but i like that i am safe
customer_reviews.author: danny saenz

customer_reviews.title: Once set up easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy so it was a little hard to set up but once I got there works great
customer_reviews.author: Ron Barton

customer_reviews.title: Useless safety device
customer_reviews.text: Piece of chinese garbage that will not protect you in a fall EVER you will die by loose straps or by hanging yourself!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan C.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for Hunting
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item to use hunting, as it was the cheapest and able to arrive the fastest. I didn't fall out of the tree, but if i did it would have kept me safe.
customer_reviews.author: P.Diddly.Squat

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the orders are complete
customer_reviews.text: I like the item but it’s incomplete I’m missing the ropes I would like to receive the ropes
customer_reviews.author: Daisy De Leon

customer_reviews.title: ... when working on an extension ladder Very secure and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this when working on an extension ladder Very secure and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S

customer_reviews.title: but it fits great and adjust fairly easy
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, but it fits great and adjust fairly easy. I would recommnd.
customer_reviews.author: Radio Operator

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I used a couples of time and I am pleased with this product
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Will give new review
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems good I have not put it to the test yet. After putting it to use I will write another review

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect. Used with parapet wall mount and I felt secure with the harness on.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Horto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'll love it, if and when it saves my life. Fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RONALD REYNOLDS

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Light and comfortable to use, you can wear it all day long

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but look dam sexy and well built

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: I think it's not safe. It loosens on all sides
customer_reviews.author: Jose Manuel Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Roof Safety
customer_reviews.text: Excellent safety harness. I used it as I was installing a roof vent on my home.
customer_reviews.author: JVP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the small climbing I had to do
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great! Very comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: This is great ! Very comfortable to wear, does not get tangled up and very good quality and stitching. Would recommend it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: David 204

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good product, however the leg straps are much longer than they would need to be.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this test to hang stands and ladders for handsfree working, I weigh 250# it. Holds me fine
customer_reviews.author: Tall tree

customer_reviews.title: Poor, unreadable instructions
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be well made, but the packaging and instructions included are ridiculous. The fitting instructions are so small and of such poor quality printing as to render them unreadable (I guess they could not afford a larger piece if paper) . The instructions are for two different models to add to the confusion and no where on the product or packaging does it indicate the model of the product that you purchased. I can not find a country of origin on the product or packaging, but my guess is China, because I think any American company would do a better job communicating with the end user. I will never buy another product from this company.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it. This 3 D-ring harness is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend it. This 3 D-ring harness is perfect! It has nice stitching detail, sound hardware, and a large range of solid adjustment. It fits me well for both work positioning and movement. I'm no expert. But, I have done my own roofing work in these 76 years and I expect to live to do some more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I thought it would be like the picture with two loops in the front that I could attach to with a sling and carabiners that can be looped around a tree and with climbing spikes on my boots,I could limb trees. I don't understand why there are no support loops in the front as advertised. I have been gone since I purchased this and just got back to review the item; hence the late response. This device is essentially useless for my job. Doug Robertson
customer_reviews.author: Doug Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great safety harness
customer_reviews.text: Doing some work on my roof and needed to work safe; besides this safety harness bought other items like a a rigging ropes and clips. Now my wife doesn't have to worry while I'm up on the roof; be smart; work safe
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: A must for me.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for when you don't want to wear the community harness with every one of your coworkers sweat stains on it. Great price for peace of mind. It's comfortable as any we have in the shop and not a lot of extra to make it hotter than it needs to be. Thinner webbing than some but still rated for my fat self.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Solid Safety Harness
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. Easy to put on and adjust to fit. I'm 5'9'' and 165# and it fit me with extra length available for someone larger.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. Highest quality. Recommend the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Picard321

product_meta.title: KwikSafety (Charlotte, NC) THUNDER 3D Ring Safety Harness (Pass Through Connectors) OSHA ANSI Industrial Full Body Fall Protection Personal Equipment Construction Carpenter Scaffold Contractor
feature_bullets: WHO – “We Don’t Cut Corners on Safety” | The KwikSafety THUNDER is a durable, heavy duty, high performance Full Body Harness that meets and exceeds ANSI/ASSE Z359.11-2014 standards. Be seen and be safe with the fluorescent yellow durable, synthetic material. Use with any compatible fall protection safety lanyard, energy absorbers, lifelines, and anchorage lanyards. Safely perform the job knowing the THUNDER fall protection harness has your back!

WHAT – “All the Safety Bells and Whistles” | Our THUNDER safety harness is fully equipped with one (1) Dorsal Ring on the back and can be suitable for primary fall arrester attachment, travel restraint, and rescue. The load bearing straps are made from pure, non-recycled synthetic material that is water repellant, has superior stitching, and resistant against ageing, heat, and abrasion. Ensure a safe and proper fit with three (3) pass-through buckles located on the hips and chest of the harness.

WHEN – “To Make a Long Safety Story Short” | This “One Size Fits Most” harness supports users 130 to 310 pounds (59 to 140 kilograms), 4’10” to 6’6” (147 to 198 centimeters) because of the multiple adjustment points. The pass through connectors are made of anodized yellow zinc to help preserve the longevity and durability of the harness by preventing rusting. Impact indicator tags located on the back straps release in the event of sudden impact from a fall.

WHERE – “At the Right Place at the Right Time” | Working at heights 6 ft or more? Equip yourself with the proper fall arrest system. The THUNDER safety harness is great for use at at Ports, Airports, Highways, Military Installations and Other Government Facilities. Great fall protection gear for jobs in Construction, Arborist, Window Washer, Gutter Cleaning, Roofing, Warehouses, Towers, Tree Climbing, Search and Rescue.

WHY – “STRAIGHT FROM THE SAFETY HORSE’S MOUTH” | KwikSafety products are proudly designed & shipped from Charlotte, NC, USA. Our Charlotte-based team will quickly answer any and all of your questions and concerns about your order in English or Spanish, si habla Espanol (arnes de seguridad, arnés de protección contra caídas). KwikSafety products are premium stylish safety products designed by Americans with American Standard level of quality. If you have a problem, we have a solution.
